      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The coordinates of the clicked board cell (row, column).

    • showbookshelf

      public void showbookshelf(LocalBookshelf localBookshelf)

    • showAllBookshelf

      public void showAllBookshelf()

    • showBoard

      public void showBoard()
      Shows the game board on the game screen. Resets the board grid and populates it with the items from the game board. Each item is represented by an image on the grid.

    • showHand

      public void showHand()
      Shows the hand of the player on the game screen. Removes any existing hand images and populates the hand slots with the items from the local player's hand. Each item is represented by an image in the corresponding hand slot.

    • showArrows

      public void showArrows(int handSize)
      Shows the arrow buttons on the game screen based on the current hand size. Determines whether there is space left in each hand slot and sets the visibility of the arrow buttons accordingly.
      Parameters:
      handSize - The current size of the hand.

    • showTokens

      public void showTokens()
      Shows the scoring tokens on the game screen. Sets the images of the common scoring tokens and each player's scoring tokens based on the game model data.

    • showEndGameToken

      public void showEndGameToken()
      Shows the end game token on the game screen. Sets the image of the end game token for the local player and each player's bookshelf based on the game model data.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Resets the images of the board grid by setting them to null.

    • removeHandImages

      public void removeHandImages()
      Removes the images from the hand.

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn(String name)
      Sets the turn for the specified player by enabling/disabling grids and updating visibility.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player whose turn it is.

    • isImageViewEmpty

      public boolean isImageViewEmpty(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
      Checks if the specified ImageView is empty.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView to check.
      Returns:
      true if the ImageView is empty (contains no image), false otherwise.

    • getCommonPathByType

      public String getCommonPathByType(int type)
      Retrieves the common goal card file path based on the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the common image.
      Returns:
      The file path for the common image.

      Parameters:
      n - The number of the personal image.
      Returns:
      The file path for the personal image.

    • noSpaceLeft

      public boolean noSpaceLeft(int column, int handSize)
      Checks if there is no space left in the specified column of the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      column - The column index to check.
      handSize - The size of the hand.
      Returns:
      true if there is no space left in the column, false otherwise.

      Shows a global notification message based on the specified notification type, name, coordinates, list, and column.
      Parameters:
      notificationsType - The type of the notification.
      name - The name associated with the notification.
      coordinates - The coordinates associated with the notification.
      list - The list associated with the notification.
      column - The column associated with the notification.
